titles: The spring of strengthning grace in the Rock of Ages, Jesus Christ demonstrated in a plain and short sermon / preached at Twickenham in Middlesex, near Hampton-Court, April 16, 1648, by Thomas Hill ...
author: Hill, Thomas, d. 1653.
notes: Includes: Truth and love happily married in the saints and in the churches of Christ.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
